No comment from anyone about proposed halfing classes?  I was 
expecting a 'No Way, That would make characters too powerfull' 
argument from somebody.

> How about adding halfing classes (mixture of two character types) if 
> they both have experience levels above 20? Like combining a 'High 
> Priest' with an 'Archmage' would result in two characters which each 
> have half its original abilites and half the abilities of the other 
> one.  The catch: all the specials must be present between the two of 
> them: example both of them couldn't have the power of 'Heal', 
'Summon 
> Image/Summon Fire Elemental', etc.  You could NOT place halfings in 
>a scenario using the editor to fight against.
